General.Name: Enchem Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Enchem Co., Ltd. specializes in the development and manufacturing of electrolytes and high functionality additives for rechargeable batteries and electric double layer capacitors (EDLC). Its products include electrolytes for lithium rechargeable and polymer batteries; electrolytes for EDLC; high functionality additives; binder solutions; and chemical stock for electronic materials. The company also provides small batteries for mobile applications, mid-size batteries for xEV, and high capacity ESS and EDLC. The company's products are used in mobile phone, laptop PC, power tools, e-bike, e-scooter,e-cart, HEV, PHEV, BEV, FCEV, and ESS applications. Enchem Co., Ltd. was founded in 2012 and is based in Jecheon, South Korea.
